BOHACHEVSKY.dev_comment: Multimodal, continuous, and non-convex. Suitable for testing optimization algorithms on smooth, multimodal functions.
BOHACHEVSKY.reference: @article{bohachevsky1986, title={Techniques for optimizing applications with multimodal functions}, author={Bohachevsky et al.}, year={1986}}
BOHACHEVSKY.summary: A 2D multimodal function with a global minimum at (0, 0) and value 0.7.
